column1: Appendix table 8. Standard errors for appendix table 7: Number and proportion of all arrests following release that were within or outside the state of release, among prisoners released in 30 states in 2005
Report title: Multistate Criminal History Patterns of Prisoners Released in 30 States, NCJ 248942
Data Source: Bureau of Justice Statistics, Recidivism of State Prisoners Released in 2005 data collection.
Author:(s) Matthew R. Durose, Howard N. Snyder, Ph.D., and Alexia D. Cooper, Ph.D.

Appendix table 8. Standard errors for appendix table 7: Number and proportion of all arrests following release that were within or outside the state of release, among prisoners released in 30 states in 2005
Note: Number of arrests was rounded to nearest 10.
Source: Bureau of Justice Statistics, Recidivism of State Prisoners Released in 2005 data collection.
